package.name: System_Mount
package.summary: Mount and unmount devices in fstab
package.description:
System_Mount provides a simple interface to deal with mounting and unmounting devices listed in the system's fstab.
Features: * Very compact, easy-to-read code, based on File_Fstab. * Examines mount options to determine if a device can be mounted or not. * Extremely easy to use. * Fully documented with PHPDoc.

release.notes: * New stable release. No changes since beta2.
* Fix docblocks, use @var instead of @type. * Add simple example to class docblock. * Minor CS fix, 'false' instead of 'FALSE.' * Don't return from constructor.

* Update to new (2.0.0) File_Fstab semantics. * Better error checking in example code. * Fix constructor, make sure File_Fstab gets the correct entryClass. * Bump dep versions. * Store mtab instance in a PEAR staticProperty instead of calling singleton() zillions of times. *
